mapper.select: select simulation_equipment_id, name, number, type, software_system, version_number, supplier, status, purpose, laboratory_id, thumbnail, create_time, update_time from simulation_equipment;

select simulation_equipment_id, name, number, type, software_system, version_number, supplier, status, purpose, laboratory_id, thumbnail, create_time, update_time from simulation_equipment where number like concat(#{number},'%');

select simulation_equipment_id, name, number, type, software_system, version_number, supplier, status, purpose, laboratory_id, thumbnail, create_time, update_time from simulation_equipment where name like concat('%', #{name},'%');
